languages.text: "Воин, лишенный права на подвиг — что зверь, посаженный в клетку. Сначала его сердце гложет безумие, после — Моркаи, несущий смерть".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Воин, лишенный подвига, что зверь, посаженный в клетку. Сначала его сердце гложет безумие, после — Моркаи, несущий смерть".
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "A warrior robbed of his right to perform feats in battle is akin to a caged beast. First, it is madness that gnaws at his heart, and then, it is Morkai, the bringer of death."
languages.original_text: "Воин, лишенный права на подвиг — что зверь, посаженный в клетку. Сначала его сердце гложет безумие, после — Моркаи, несущий смерть".

traits.locale_text: "A warrior robbed of his right to perform feats in battle is akin to a caged beast. First, it is madness that gnaws at his heart, and then, it is Morkai, the bringer of death."

"A warrior robbed of his right to perform feats in battle is akin to a caged beast. First, it is madness that gnaws at his heart, and then, it is Morkai, the bringer of death."

languages.text: "Ein Krieger, dem das Recht genommen wird, in der Schlacht anzutreten, kommt einem Tier im Käfig gleich. Zuerst frisst der Wahnsinn sein Herz an und dann Morkai, Bringer des Todes."
languages.original_text: "A warrior robbed of his right to perform feats in battle is akin to a caged beast. First, it is madness that gnaws at his heart, and then, it is Morkai, the bringer of death."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Krieger, dem das Recht genommen wird, in der Schlacht anzutreten, kommt einem Tier im Käfig gleich. Zuerst frisst der Wahnsinn sein Herz an und dann Morkai, Bringer des Todes."

languages.text: « Un guerrier à qui l'on a interdit de se battre est comparable à une bête en cage. Tout d'abord, son cœur se fait ronger par la folie, puis par Morkai, le héraut de la mort. »
languages.original_text: "A warrior robbed of his right to perform feats in battle is akin to a caged beast. First, it is madness that gnaws at his heart, and then, it is Morkai, the bringer of death."

traits.locale_text: « Un guerrier à qui l'on a interdit de se battre est comparable à une bête en cage. Tout d'abord, son cœur se fait ronger par la folie, puis par Morkai, le héraut de la mort. »

languages.text: “被剥夺了战斗权利的战士，就像被关在笼子里的野兽一样。疯狂会先啃噬他的心灵，之后，死亡的使者莫凯会吞噬他的肉体。”
languages.original_text: "A warrior robbed of his right to perform feats in battle is akin to a caged beast. First, it is madness that gnaws at his heart, and then, it is Morkai, the bringer of death."

traits.locale_text: “被剥夺了战斗权利的战士，就像被关在笼子里的野兽一样。疯狂会先啃噬他的心灵，之后，死亡的使者莫凯会吞噬他的肉体。”

languages.text: «Un guerrero arrebatado de su derecho a la gloria de la batalla es igual que una bestia enjaulada. Primero, la locura atenaza su corazón, y después, Morkai, el portador de la muerte».
languages.original_text: "A warrior robbed of his right to perform feats in battle is akin to a caged beast. First, it is madness that gnaws at his heart, and then, it is Morkai, the bringer of death."

traits.locale_text: «Un guerrero arrebatado de su derecho a la gloria de la batalla es igual que una bestia enjaulada. Primero, la locura atenaza su corazón, y después, Morkai, el portador de la muerte».

languages.text: 「戦場で戦う腕を奪われた戦士は、檻に閉じ込められた獣のようなものだ。まずは狂気がその心を蝕み、そして死をもたらすモルカイが訪れるのだ」
languages.original_text: "A warrior robbed of his right to perform feats in battle is akin to a caged beast. First, it is madness that gnaws at his heart, and then, it is Morkai, the bringer of death."

traits.locale_text: 「戦場で戦う腕を奪われた戦士は、檻に閉じ込められた獣のようなものだ。まずは狂気がその心を蝕み、そして死をもたらすモルカイが訪れるのだ」

languages.text: "Savaşta kahramanlık yapma hakkından mahrum bırakılan bir savaşçı, kafesteki bir canavara benzer. Önce delilik kemirir yüreğini, sonra ise ölüm getiren Morkai."
languages.original_text: "A warrior robbed of his right to perform feats in battle is akin to a caged beast. First, it is madness that gnaws at his heart, and then, it is Morkai, the bringer of death."

traits.locale_text: "Savaşta kahramanlık yapma hakkından mahrum bırakılan bir savaşçı, kafesteki bir canavara benzer. Önce delilik kemirir yüreğini, sonra ise ölüm getiren Morkai."
